indications:
Indications oral hygiene, 
(From 12.3.4 Mouthwashes, gargles, and dentifrices: British National Formulary)
12.3.4 Mouthwashes, gargles, and dentifrices
name: HYDROGEN PEROXIDE
side-effects:
Side-effects hypertrophy of papillae of tongue on prolonged
used
doses:
rinse the mouth for 2–3 minutes with 15 mL diluted in
half a tumblerful of warm water 2–3 times daily

name: HYDROGEN PEROXIDE - OXIDISERS AND DYES
breadcrumbs: 13.11 Skin cleansers, antiseptics, and desloughing agents
cautions:
Cautions large or deep wounds; avoid on healthy skin and eyes; bleaches fabric; incompatible with products containing
iodine or potassium permanganate
doses:
superficial bacterial skin infection, apply 2–3 times
daily for up to 3 weeks

indications:
Indications oral hygiene, 
(From 12.3.4 Mouthwashes, gargles, and dentifrices: British National Formulary)
12.3.4 Mouthwashes, gargles, and dentifrices
name: HYDROGEN PEROXIDE - MOUTHWASHES, GARGLES, AND DENTIFRICES
side-effects:
Side-effects hypertrophy of papillae of tongue on prolonged
used
doses:
rinse the mouth with 10 mL for about 1 minute up to 4
times daily (after meals and at bedtime)
